title: World-Wide
text:
Senate Republicans presented a $928 billion infrastructure plan to the White House, closing the gap with the White House's latest $1.7 trillion offer as the two sides attempt to break an impasse.

---

Members of a WHO-led team investigating the origins of Covid-19 urged the U.N . agency's member states to mandate a second phase of research.

---

The FDA and Johnson & Johnson expect to announce within days that contamination problems at a Covid-19 vaccine plant in Baltimore are resolved.

---

Prospects dimmed for an independent commission to investigate the Jan. 6 assault on the Capitol after most Senate Republicans lined up against the proposal at the urging of GOP leaders.

---

Bill Gates and Melinda French Gates are discussing changes to the structure of their foundation to add more governance and independence, as they plan to divorce.
